channel.title: CVE Feed for AMD -- AMD Processors
channel.description: The latest CVEs for AMD -- AMD Processors

item.title: CVE-2022-29900|2024-08-03T06:33:43.145Z -- amd -- amd%20processors
item.description: Mis-trained branch predictions for return instructions may allow arbitrary speculative code execution under certain microarchitecture-dependent conditions.

item.title: CVE-2022-23825|2024-08-03T03:51:46.140Z -- amd -- amd%20processors
item.description: Aliases in the branch predictor may cause some AMD processors to predict the wrong branch type potentially leading to information disclosure.

item.title: CVE-2022-23824|2024-08-03T03:51:46.071Z -- amd -- amd%20processors
item.description: IBPB may not prevent return branch predictions from being specified by pre-IBPB branch targets leading to a potential information disclosure.

item.title: CVE-2022-23823|2024-08-03T03:51:46.073Z -- amd -- amd%20processors
item.description: A potential vulnerability in some AMD processors using frequency scaling may allow an authenticated attacker to execute a timing attack to potentially enable information disclosure.
